clues.text: A 1954 article by Michael Dummett is provocatively titled, "Can" one of these "precede its cause?"

Nickname of Ms. Spencer-Devlin, the LPGA's first openly gay player

rounds.text: It's the only 2-word state name in which neither word appears in the name of any other state
